snippet.title: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX 2 - World Premiere Trailer
snippet.description:
Break into the new apeX of 2D action!

Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX 2 is coming January 27, 2022 to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam (PC)!

Copen and Lola are back in this direct sequel to Luminous Avenger iX released in 2019, and Copen's high-speed action is more intense than ever! What new fates await them in a parallel world where only robots exist...? 

The game will be available digitally on all platforms for $24.99. A physical version is currently planned for release in the west on Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4 as well, stay tuned for more details!

Title: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX 2
Platforms: Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Steam
Genre: Action
Rating: TBD
Players: 1
Release Date: 1/27/2022
Price: $24.99 USD

Luminous Avenger iX 2 Official Website: http://gunvolt.com/en/x2

INTI CREATES Official Website: http://www.inticreates.com

© INTI CREATES CO., LTD. 2022 ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
